duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct testing and analysis of WiFi networks to ensure functionality and performance.
Develop and execute test cases for wireless network components and features.
Utilize test equipment and methodologies to validate WiFi network performance.
Think creatively to identify and address WiFi network issues and challenges.
Work with MSO and adhere to the 802.11 standard for WiFi network testing.
Utilize testing tools such as Ixia, Spirent, Octobox, and Rohde & Schwarz for WiFi network testing.
Possess CCNA Routing and Switching certification and programming knowledge in Python, C++, JavaScript, and experience with Cisco IOS or equivalent vendor.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (Master's preferred)
